Title: 37339 - # Contract Services Successful Businesses Use
Direction: 500 words: Come up with 3-6 things that a successful company will look outside the corporate structure to get done. One example would be the implementation of technology change; that lets you work in the client link, which is to a consultation firm that does just that. Other examples include social media marketing, expanding work capacity temporarily to finish a high priority project, and payroll services. The audience is for those that work for or with all levels of corporations.

Title: 37341 - # Ingredients for Success in Your Small Business
Direction: 500 words - Suggest 3-6 ways to improve your small or home business. Keep in mind that the readers could come from different backgrounds and fields, so keep the suggestions broad enough to apply in many cases. The client link is a management consulting firm, which you could mention by doing an item about evaluating and augmenting the management structure of your business.
